name: Hot Wine
keywords: beaujolais, lemon, sugar, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, fall, winter
recipeIngredient: 6 cups (about 2 bottles) robust, fruity, acidic wine (Beaujolais, cabernet sauvignon, merlot or zinfandel)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the wine in a saucepan with the sugar and heat the mixture slowly until just below a boil. Meanwhile, squeeze a wedge of lemon into each of six mugs and drop the wedges into the mugs.
Divide the wine among the mugs and serve immediately.
